data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 2, Goal kick for Seattle at CenturyLink Field.
Throw-in for Seattle at CenturyLink Field.
Seattle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 3, Ball safe as Seattle is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Seattle.
Nicolas Lodeiro for Seattle drives towards goal at CenturyLink Field. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 5, In Seattle a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Free kick Los Angeles.
Eddie Segura (Los Angeles) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 6, It's a goal kick for the home team in Seattle.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
In the minute 8, Seattle's Jordan Morris goes close with his head but his effort is blocked.
Throw-in Los Angeles.
Joseph Dickerson awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 10, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Joseph Dickerson signals a throw-in for Seattle, close to Los Angeles's area.
Joevin Jones of Seattle gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 11, Joseph Dickerson awards Los Angeles a goal kick.
Seattle have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Seattle's Kelvin Leerdam gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 12, Los Angeles have a goal kick.
Los Angeles advance rapidly upfield but Joseph Dickerson blows for offside.
Free kick for Seattle in the half of Los Angeles.
In the minute 15, Ball goes out of play for a Seattle goal kick.
Raul Ruidiaz (Seattle) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Los Angeles capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Seattle's half?
In the minute 19, Throw-in for Seattle in the half of Los Angeles.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in their own half.
Los Angeles's Francisco Ginella gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Seattle defender.
In the minute 22, Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
Free kick Los Angeles.
Throw-in high up the field for Los Angeles in Seattle.
In the minute 25, Joseph Dickerson signals a Seattle throw-in in Los Angeles's half.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
Seattle have been given a penalty...
In the minute 29, Goal! Nicolas Lodeiro gives Seattle a 1-0 lead from the penalty spot.
In Seattle a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Seattle have been awarded a penalty...
In the minute 33, Nicolas Lodeiro nets and Seattle extend their lead to 2-0. The goal came from the penalty spot.
Los Angeles to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seattle's half?
In the minute 34, Free kick for Seattle in the half of Los Angeles.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Seattle.
In Seattle a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 38, Joseph Dickerson signals a Los Angeles throw-in in Seattle's half.
Los Angeles needs to be cautious. Seattle have an attacking throw-in.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Seattle to check on Nouhou Tolo, who is grimacing with pain.
In the minute 40, Ball safe as Los Angeles is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick Seattle.
Nouhou Tolo is back on his feet again.
In the minute 42, Los Angeles have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in for Los Angeles at CenturyLink Field.
Los Angeles are coming forward and Latif Blessing gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
In the minute 44, Ball goes out of play for a Seattle goal kick.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Seattle.
Los Angeles awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Los Angeles to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Throw-in for Seattle close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Los Angeles in the half of Seattle.
The first half has been concluded at CenturyLink Field.
Joseph Dickerson has blown to start the second-half.
Joseph Dickerson awards Seattle a goal kick.
In the minute 46, Andy Najar is replacing Bradley Wright-Phillips for Los Angeles at CenturyLink Field.
The away team have replaced Francisco Ginella with Eduard Atuesta. This is the first substitution made today by Bob Bradley.
In the minute 47, Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seattle's half?
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Joseph Dickerson signals a throw-in for Los Angeles, close to Seattle's area.
In the minute 49, In Seattle, Los Angeles push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Los Angeles in their own half.
In the minute 52, It's a goal kick for the home team in Seattle.
Free kick for Los Angeles in the half of Seattle.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 54, Jose Cifuentes (Los Angeles) has received a yellow card from Joseph Dickerson.
Los Angeles awarded a free kick in their own half.
Los Angeles push forward at CenturyLink Field and Mark Anthony Kaye gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Seattle defence.
In the minute 56, Brian Rodriguez of Los Angeles smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Throw-in high up the field for Los Angeles in Seattle.
Attention is being given to Los Angeles’s Diego Rossi and play has been suspended briefly.
In the minute 60, Goal kick for Seattle at CenturyLink Field.
Throw-in for Los Angeles close to the penalty box.
Diego Rossi has recovered and rejoins the match in Seattle.
In the minute 60, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Important block from the Seattle defence as Brian Rodriguez fires in a strike for Los Angeles.
Seattle will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Los Angeles.
In the minute 62, Seattle have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Los Angeles!
Free kick for Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 63, Xavier Arreaga for Seattle has been booked by Joseph Dickerson and receives a first yellow card.
Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seattle's half?
In the minute 65, Joseph Dickerson signals a Los Angeles throw-in in Seattle's half.
Corner awarded to Seattle.
Seattle pushes forward through Joao Paulo, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 67, Seattle have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Los Angeles are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Bob Bradley is making the team's fourth substitution at CenturyLink Field with Danny Musovski replacing Jose Cifuentes.
In the minute 69, Los Angeles make their third substitution with Adrien Perez replacing Brian Rodriguez.
Seattle awarded a free kick in their own half.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Seattle in their own half.
In the minute 71, In Seattle a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Nicolas Lodeiro (Seattle) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
The home team replace Joevin Jones with Alex Roldan.
In the minute 72, Seattle needs to be cautious. Los Angeles have an attacking throw-in.
Can Los Angeles capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Seattle's half?
Joseph Dickerson awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 74, Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Los Angeles.
Throw-in for Los Angeles in the half of Seattle.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
In the minute 76, Los Angeles have a dangerous throw-in.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Eduard Atuesta for Los Angeles who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Corner awarded to Los Angeles.
In the minute 79, Seattle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Seattle needs to be cautious. Los Angeles have an attacking throw-in.
Los Angeles’s Eduard Atuesta is on his feet again at CenturyLink Field.
In the minute 80, Los Angeles have a dangerous throw-in.
Throw-in Seattle.
Free kick for Seattle in the half of Los Angeles.
In the minute 82, It's now 3-0 in Seattle as Raul Ruidiaz scores for Seattle.
Joao Paulo instrumental with a fine assist.
Los Angeles to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Los Angeles in the half of Seattle.
Throw-in high up the field for Los Angeles in Seattle.
In the minute 84, Can Los Angeles capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Seattle's half?
Los Angeles are in shooting range from this free kick.
At CenturyLink Field, Yeimar Gomez Andrade has been yellow-carded for the home team.
Los Angeles have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Seattle awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Shane O'Neill is replacing Jordan Morris for the home team.
In the minute 87, Bob Bradley (Los Angeles) is making a fifth substitution, with Christian Torres replacing Diego Rossi.
Can Los Angeles get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Seattle's half?
In the minute 88, Miguel Ibarra is on a sub for Kelvin Leerdam for Seattle.
Ball goes out of play for a Seattle goal kick.
Free kick for Los Angeles in their own half.
5 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Free kick Los Angeles.
Los Angeles to take a throw-in in Seattle territory.
In Seattle a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Joseph Dickerson awards the away team a throw-in.
It's 3-0 as the referee blows for full-time.
Brian Schmetzer (Seattle) is making a fourth substitution, with Will Bruin replacing Raul Ruidiaz.
Los Angeles's Andy Najar has been booked in Seattle.
